free.name: Free
free.note: The free package allows for up to 100, 00 free transaction per day, if the amount is exceeded the client is free to per per extra transaction a fee of $0.002 or upgrade to another package.

basic.name: Basic
basic.note: The basic package allows for up to 500, 00 transaction per day, if the amount is exceeded the client is free to per per extra transaction a fee of $0.001 or upgrade to another package.

premium.name: Premium
premium.note: The premium package allows for up to 1, 000, 00 transaction per day for 100 concurrent users, if the amount is exceeded the client is free to per per extra transaction a fee of $0.001 per transaction and $0.002 per added users or upgrade to another package.
premium.exceeded_cost: $0.001 US per transaction/ $0.002 US per added user

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.note: The enerprise package allows for unlimited transaction per day for 200 concurrent users, if the amount of concurrent users needs to be increased the client will be charged $0.002 per added user. The client is also free to reduce the packaged if the neede arises
